CustomField.formula: IF ( (MONTH( GDMFSL_Asset__r.Annual_Maintenance_Date__c ) = 2 && DAY( GDMFSL_Asset__r.Annual_Maintenance_Date__c ) = 29 ) && ( MOD( YEAR( GDMFSL_Asset__r.Annual_Maintenance_Date__c )+ (GDMFSL_Frequency_Every_N__c-1), 400 ) = 0 || ( MOD( YEAR( GDMFSL_Asset__r.Annual_Maintenance_Date__c )+ (GDMFSL_Frequency_Every_N__c-1), 4 ) = 0 && MOD( YEAR( GDMFSL_Asset__r.Annual_Maintenance_Date__c )+ (GDMFSL_Frequency_Every_N__c-1), 100 ) != 0 ) ), true, false)
CustomField.label: Add Leap Year Factor
